author: jstrachan
msg: added a ConsumerListener so that you can listen to consumers coming and going easily (hiding the details of the Advisories behind a simple Bean API) as well as be notified on exactly how many consumers there are to be able to drive demand based publishing etc

author: jstrachan
msg: added test case for using the BrokerService with JMX

author: jstrachan
msg: added some helper methods to make it easy to see the type of removal event

author: jstrachan
msg: avoid persistence and TCP by default in test cases

author: jstrachan
msg: fixed bug where setting the clientID on the MBean ObjectName could break a JMX name
